price: 你说：“假若我能主持你们要求早日实现的刑罚，那么，我与你们之间的事情，必定被判决了。”安拉是最了解不义者的。
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ أَنَّ عِندِي مَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِهِۦ لَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qul law anna ʿindī mā tastaʿjilūna bihi laquḍiya al-amru baynī wabaynakum wal-lahu aʿlamu bil-ẓālimīna
